title: GCN Schema for Fermi GBM Alert Notices
description: This schema is used to report Fermi GBM Alerts.

human_in_the_loop.description: True when a human had input or confirmed before further processing. False when the notice was generated entirely automatically. Sometimes abbreviated as "HITL".

trigger_algorithm_number.description: The instrument flight software algorithm that triggered on this event, dependent on timescale, energy, and significance as described in A. von Kienlin et al 2020 ApJ 893 46.

light_curve_url.description: URL of the quicklook light curve plot
